DataElement.preferredName: Additional Hormone Therapy Post Recurrent Disease Administered Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text yes/no/unknown indicator to signify additional administration of hormonal therapy after return of disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Additional Hormone Therapy Post Recurrent Disease Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the additional administration of  various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level after the return of a disease after a period of remission or new disease.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Added; extra. (from American Heritage Dictionary):Various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level. The treatment may include administration of hormones or hormone analogs to the patient, or decreasing the level of hormones in the body by using hormone antagonists, or hormone ablation therapy. The concept covers but not limited to: intermittent or permanent hormone suppression or ablation in treatment of hormone-dependent tumors, hormone replacement therapy of any kind, hormonal component of gender reassignment therapy, hormonal contraception, surgical and radiation castration.

Concepts.definition: Various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level.

Property.preferredDefinition: Post; occuring after.:the return of a sign, symptom, or disease after a remission.:Given.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
The return of a disease after a period of remission.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes, No, or Unknown to represent a condition.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
